info.name: KairosPulse-Alert-API
info.description:
Complete API collection for KairosPulse system with 5 endpoints:

üìä ALERT APIs:
1. GET /api/alerts - Get all alerts with pagination
2. POST /api/alerts - Create new alert nodes (always adds new, never replaces)
3. GET /api/alerts/latest - Get only the most recent alert

üìÅ EXCEL APIs:
4. POST /api/upload-excel - Upload and replace Excel dashboard file
5. GET /api/upload-excel - Get current Excel file information

Alert data saves to MongoDB collection 'KairosPulse-Tracking' in 'kairosdb' database.
Excel file always saved as 'Koyfin Dashboard and PA nbs Execution Details_Latest 1 - SriniK.xlsx'.
